fileUpload.optionField: Allow learners to check their answer.

MultipleChoiceOptionsRule1Value: Each learner will see the options provided in random order.
MultipleChoiceOptionsRule2Value: Allow learners to check their answer.
MultipleChoiceOptionsRule3Value: Learners can gain a percentage of the maximum points by getting portions of the block correct.
MultipleChoiceOptionsRule4Value: Multiple Select. Learners can choose more than one option.
MultipleChoiceOptionsRule5Value: For polls/surveys. No correct answer. Any response will be marked correct.
PresentationModePopUpDescriptionValue: View the exact display from the student perspective. You can interact with the code and activities just as a student would.
